backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining product types, static product list, and query methods for listing, filtering, searching, and fetching products by ID.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata mapping features to affected frontend files with IDs, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document setting the page title to Luxury Bazar and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the application in the CartProvider.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: React context and reducer managing cart items, quantity updates, removal, and subtotal calculation.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Type definitions for cart items, state, and reducer actions.
frontend/src/cart/useCart.ts: Custom hook providing access to the cart context with safety checks.
frontend/src/components/catalog/Category: Category hero banner component showing a themed image, title, and description for a given category.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductC: Product card showing image, title, price, and add‑to‑cart action linking to the product page.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductG: Responsive grid layout wrapper for product cards.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductM: Displays product category badge, formatted price, and optional description.
frontend/src/components/common/StoreSect: Reusable page section wrapper with optional title and description.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ErrorSt: Error display component with message and optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Loading: Skeleton‑based loading component with optional message.
frontend/src/components/home/SectionLink: UI card linking to category pages, extracting category from href and showing image, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/layout/StoreFoot: Store footer with navigation links, social icons, and dynamic year plus referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/StoreLayo: Wraps header, footer, and routed content into a full-page layout.
Header with nav links, store logo, and cart item count, supporting mobile navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, logout, stored identity, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Re-exports root CSS from parent directory.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, pricing, and empty-cart fallback.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Loads products for a category and shows hero, product grid, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard summarizing product counts and per-category metrics with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with a hero banner, category sections, and featured products fetched via React Query. Handles loading and error states while displaying product previews.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a selected product, including image, metadata, and add‑to‑cart functionality. Handles product loading, errors, and navigation back.
frontend/src/services/catalogQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing, filtering, searching, and retrieving products using the actor-based backend API. Includes enabling rules and error handling for missing actors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the storefront theme. Enables plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s current state, features, requirements, and architectural notes for building the ‘Luxury Bazar’ storefront. No code logic, only metadata and planning info.
